translations: n．煽动，刺激，激励：激发某人采取行动或产生某种情感的行为或言辞。
· His speech was full of incitements to violence.
他的演讲充满了煽动暴力的言辞。

sentences.sentence: Incitements to speak were orchestrated from all quarters, apparatuses everywhere for listening and recording, procedures for observing, questioning, and formulating.
sentences.translation: 为了煽动话语，四方作了精心的编配，收听与记录的设备随处可见，观察、审问、表述等手段一应俱全。
